item.title: Switching to Sway - My Journey Back to Linux
item.description: A few days ago, I switched to the Sway window manager after returning to GNU/Linux a few months ago. Before spending a few years in the macOS ecosystem, I was a long-time user of i3. For those unfamiliar, i3 and Sway perform the same function, but i3 is built for X.org while Sway is designed for Wayland. In this post, Iâ€™ll share my impressions, lessons learned, and the challenges I faced during this transition.
